about_the_game:
The Last Z VR :

The Last Z is an immersive co-op adventure built entirely for VR for up to 12 players over LAN.

The Story :

Following scientific experiments in a secret laboratory located in an unknown city in Arizona, a virus escaped and contaminated the entire region, with the authorities completely overwhelmed. By chance, they developed a vaccine that could save humanity from the zombie invasion.
You play as a team of soldiers and your mission will be to survive as long as possible so that the research team arrives in time with the vaccine.
Good luck !

Single or multiplayer :

You can play The Last Z alone but for more fun, we recommend that you play with other players.
Indeed, the game is playable up to 12 players in network [LAN] and the level of difficulty changes according to the number of players.
Players can talk to each other in-game using voice chat and a scoring system is displayed at the end of each game.

But how do I fight zombies ?

To fight the hordes of zombies, you have several different guns to choose from. a pistol, a shotgun and an ak-47 which will be very practical;). In addition to the standard weapon set, you can also use the Gatling gun which you can find on the map.

What is the difficulty of the game ?

Do not panic !
The difficulty is increasing,
the zombies are not difficult to fight at the beginning of the game but the more you progress in the game, the more zombies will arrive in number and will be more difficult to fight.

content_descriptors.notes: This game takes place during a zombie apocalypse involving zombies, dogs and other mutated monsters. It contains violence, blood, horror and is not recommended for players under the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7700
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
